pages.title: ⍟ Three of Pentacles ⍟
pages.text: Spirit of Material Works$(br)     ♂ Mars in ♑ Capricorn

Three pentacles are shown as part of the beautiful architecture of a monastery.$(br)  The intricate engraving of the design is proof of the skill of the sculptor.$(br)  The art piece rests atop the high ceiling, integrated in the sturdy masonry built by the architect.$(br)  This creation would hold no meaning if not for the spiritual understanding it symbolizes, which is the contribution of the monastery monk.

Each person has an important role to play, the things they do that represent them, the kind of work they do, what they produce and give to others - in exchange for payment, but also as a way to realize their creativity.$(br)  When they come together as a team, they can create something much more significant than if they were to undertake the project on their own.$(br)  Without spiritual truth, any effort, especially art, is

empty. Without knowledge and skill, it is mute and fickle. Without actual hard work, it is never realized.$(br)  This card signifies mastery at work and its synergies. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Hard work, mastery, skill, cooperation, success, renown, glory.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Mediocrity, failure to do the best possible. Difficulty cooperating, pettiness.
